title: Old transactions
body: I deleted my old emails and a few of them were old receipts for rp purchases and now I need them to recover my account, is there anyway to recover the old transactions or receipts

replies.body:
The only way to recover them would be through player support, but if you're doing an account recovery that isn't gonna work out. 

There's other info you can give them tho, basically anything that is unique to the account but not visible on it. Like was Surprise Party Amumu a mystery gift (bonus if you know who from)? Did you buy Dunkmaster Darius the day it came out? Did you buy Quinn with RP? Maybe you remember a big payday and buying $100 in RP?
I sent them information like that but unfortunately it wasnt enough.
You'll just have to go digging for more info then I'm afraid. If Player Support isn't confident that you are the original owner of the account they aren't going to release it to you.
